text: We know from the diaries of Samuel Pepys that he was a great man for lace - paying as much as 3 for a lace collar. But this didn't mean he was prepared to do as much to have her gown laced.
handwritten_text: We know from the diaries of Samuel Pepys that he was a great man for lace - paying as much as 3 for a lace collar. But this didn't mean he was prepared to do as much to have her gown laced.
